web.homepage.tagline1.en: Paste a password, secret message or private link below.
web.homepage.tagline1.translation: Whakapiri he kupuhipa, karere huna, hononga tūmataiti rānei ki raro.

web.homepage.tagline2.en: Keep sensitive info out of your email and chat logs.
web.homepage.tagline2.translation: Puritia ngā mōhiohio tairongo kei waho i tō īmēra me ō rārangi kōrerorero.

web.homepage.secret_hint.en: * A secret link only works once and then disappears forever.
web.homepage.secret_hint.translation: * Ka mahi kotahi noa te hononga karere huna, kātahi ka ngaro mō ake tonu atu.

web.homepage.secret_form_more_text3.en: and be able to send the secret by email.
web.homepage.secret_form_more_text3.translation: ā, ka taea te tuku i te karere huna mā te īmēra.

web.homepage.cta_title.translation: Whakanui i te whakawhirinaki me te tuari i te māia

web.homepage.cta_subtitle.en: Elevate your brand and share with confidence
web.homepage.cta_subtitle.translation: Whakapiki i tō waitohu me te tuari i te māia

web.homepage.cta_feature3.translation: Whakapiki i te whakawhirinaki me te whai wāhi o ngā kiritaki

web.homepage.need_free_account.en: Just getting started? Send emails with a free account.
web.homepage.need_free_account.translation: Kātahi anō ka tīmata? Tukua ngā īmēra ki tētahi pūkete koreutu.

web.homepage.visit_onetime_secret_home.translation: Toro ki te whārangi matua o Onetime Secret

web.homepage.password_generation_descrip.en: Click "Generate Password" to create a secure random password that you can share.
web.homepage.password_generation_descrip.translation: Pāwhiri "Waihanga Kupuhipa" hei hanga i tētahi kupuhipa matapōkere haumaru ka taea e koe te tuari.

web.homepage.protip1.en: Your message will self-destruct after being viewed. The link can only be accessed once.
web.homepage.protip1.translation: Ka whakangaromia-anō tō karere whai muri i te tirohanga. Ka taea te uru ki te hononga kotahi anake te wā.

web.homepage.authonly.tagline2.en: Secure messaging service is for internal use only.
web.homepage.authonly.tagline2.translation: Ko tēnei ratonga mō te whakamahi ā-rohe anake.

web.homepage.authonly.tagline1.en: If you have an account, please log in to continue.
web.homepage.authonly.tagline1.translation: Ki te whai pūkenga koe, tēnā whakauru mai kia haere tonu.

web.homepage.disabled.tagline2.en: This service is setup for internal use only.
web.homepage.disabled.tagline2.translation: Kua whakaritea tēnei ratonga mō te whakamahi ā-rohe anake.

web.homepage.disabled.tagline1.en: User interface and login capabilities are not available.
web.homepage.disabled.tagline1.translation: Kāore e wātea te atanga kaiwhakamahi me ngā āheinga whakauru.

web.homepage.meets_and_exceeds_complianc.translation: Ka tutuki, ka nui atu hoki i ngā paerewa tūtohu

web.homepage.secure_your_brand_build_cus.en: Secure your brand, build customer trust with links from your domain.
web.homepage.secure_your_brand_build_cus.translation: Tiaki i tō waitohu, whakaritea te whakawhirinaki kiritaki me ngā hononga mai i tō rohe.

web.homepage.a_trusted_way_to_share_sens.en: A trusted way to share sensitive information that self-destructs after being viewed.
web.homepage.a_trusted_way_to_share_sens.translation: He huarahi pono ki te tuari i ngā mōhiohio tairongo e whakangaromia-anō whai muri i te tirohanga.

web.homepage.signup_individual_and_busin.translation: Waitohu - Ngā mahere takitahi me te pakihi

web.homepage.send_sensitive_information_.en: Send sensitive information that can only be viewed once
web.homepage.send_sensitive_information_.translation: Tukuna ngā mōhiohio tairongo ka kitea kotahi anake

web.homepage.this_is_a_private_instance_.en: This is a private instance. Only authorized team members can generate new secure links.
web.homepage.this_is_a_private_instance_.translation: He tauira tūmataiti tēnei. Ko ngā mema rōpū whakaaetia anake ka taea te waihanga i ngā hononga haumaru hou.

web.homepage.onetime_secret_helps_us_sha.en: Onetime Secret helps us share sensitive information securely while maintaining our professional facade.
web.homepage.onetime_secret_helps_us_sha.translation: Ka āwhina a Onetime Secret i a mātou ki te tuari i ngā mōhiohio tairongo i runga i te haumaru me te pupuri tonu i tō mātou kanohi ngaio.

web.homepage.information_shared_through_.en: Information shared through this service can only be accessed once. Once viewed, the content is permanently deleted to ensure confidentiality.
web.homepage.information_shared_through_.translation: Ko ngā mōhiohio i tuari mā tēnei ratonga ka taea te uru kotahi anake. Ka tirohia ana, ka mukua pūmautia te ihirangi hei whakaū i te noho muna.

web.homepage.welcome_to_the_global_broad.translation: Nau mai ki te Pāhō Ao-Whānui!
